Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
STRATEGICALLY LOCATED MIDWAY BETWEEN THE LOS ANGELES AND ORANGE COUNTY BUSINESS CENTERS
▶ Fronting the Artesia/Riverside (91) Freeway with on and off ramps on-site, plus six ingress points to site
▶ Served by the Riverside (91) Santa Ana (5) and the San Gabriel River (605) Freeways
▶ LAX, John Wayne Airport and Ontario Airport within 30 minutes of the project

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Cerritos Towne Center is a 125 acre master planned development, including the
Cerritos Performing Arts Center, a 200-room Sheraton Hotel, premium shopping
and entertainment, and over 1.2 million square feet of high quality office space.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Market ready spec suite featuring two window offices, one interior office, kitchen, and open area for workstations.
Market ready spec suite with three window offices, reception area, large conference room and break room.
Corner space with ample glass line, 4 private window offices with new lobby and additional improvements to suit.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: EFFICIENT AND FLEXIBLE FLOOR PLATES MAXIMIZING LAYOUT EFFICIENCY
RICH, GRANITE EXTERIORS AND LOBBY AREAS
ADJACENT TO RETAIL SHOPPING, RESTAURANTS, MOVIE THEATRE, AND MORE
LARGE ON-SITE CONFERENCE CENTER WITH FULLY FURNISHED BOARDROOM AND KITCHEN

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Unique opportunity well located & very central between Los Angeles & Orange County
Highly efficient building/floor plates, maximizing layout efficiency
Large on-site conference center offering fully furnished boardroom & kitchen
Surface parking/ability to expand parking ratio up to 7.9/1,000
Post-Covid friendly building, providing safe & minimal touch access to your office space, including bipolarization in the elevator and fresh outside air circulation
Large backup generator available on-site (200 kilowatt Cummins with 330 gallon fuel tank)

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Cerritos Towne Center is a 125 acre master planned development, including the Cerritos Performing Arts Center, a 200-room Sheraton Hotel, premium shopping and entertainment, and over 1.2 million square feet of high quality office space.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suites 150 & 200 are contiguous for approximately 30,037 RSF.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Newly renovated common areas, lobbies, restrooms
Walking distance to an abundance of prominent retailers and new restaurants
Abundant surface and secured structure parking
Very responsive on-site property management and engineering team
Fiber optic, high speed Internet access
